text: "Human Nature" is a single from American singer-songwriter Madonna. It is from her album Bedtime Stories, which was released in Autumn 1994. The song was written and produced by Madonna and released in June 1995. The song is about humor, sex and sarcasm. It was written in response to the huge backlash to her 1992 record Erotica and her coffee table book Sex. This single got mixed reviews by the critics, although it was a moderate hit in America, Australia and the United Kingdom. There are many versions of this song. title: Human Nature (Madonna song)
